---
name: Bug report
about: Create a report to help us improve a template, script, or document
title: "bug: [short description]"
labels: [bug]
assignees: []
---

## Describe the bug

Provide a clear and concise description of the bug. Example:
`The jq command in the README for generating L1 baselines is missing a
field.`

## Steps to reproduce

Please list the steps needed to reproduce the issue (if applicable):

1. Go to `...`
2. Click on `...`
3. Run `...`
4. Observe the error

If the issue is not reproducible, explain how it was discovered.

## Expected behavior

Describe what you expected to happen.

## Screenshots / logs

If applicable, add screenshots, error messages, or logs to help explain the
problem. When sharing logs, avoid posting secrets or private data.

## Environment

- OS: e.g. `macOS`, `Windows`, `Ubuntu`
- Shell / client: e.g. `bash`, `zsh`, `PowerShell`, `chrome`
- Version(s): CLI, app, or tool versions involved

## Additional context

Add any other context about the problem here.

If you need to share sensitive data (credentials, internal URLs, personal
data), do not post it publicly â€” instead email the maintainers or use the
private report option if available.
